mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_freeboard A WHERE 1=1
AND ( INSTR(A.writer_id, #{searchWord}) > 0 OR INSTR(A.free_title, #{searchWord}) > 0)
mapper.insert:
select fn_create_num(to_char(sysdate,'yymmdd'), 'tb_freeboard', 'free_num', UPPER('free')) FROM DUAL
insert into tb_freeboard( free_num, writer_id, free_title, free_content, free_date, rep_num, view_num )values( #{freeNum}, #{writerId}, #{freeTitle}, #{freeContent}, sysdate, 0, 0 )
mapper.select: select free_num , a.writer_id , a.free_title , a.free_content , a.free_date , a.rep_num , a.view_num , b.mem_nick from tb_freeboard a left outer join tb_member b on(a.writer_id=b.mem_id) where free_num=#{freeNum}
mapper.update: update tb_freeboard set view_num= view_num+1 where free_num=#{freeNum}
mapper.select: select a.free_num , a.free_title , a.free_content , a.writer_id , to_char(a.free_date,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') as free_date , b.attatch_num , b.attatch_order , b.file_path , b.origin_nm , b.save_nm , b.attatch_type , b.attatch_size , b.attatch_date , c.mem_nick from tb_freeboard a left outer join tb_attatch b on(a.free_num = b.attatch_place) left outer join tb_member c on(a.writer_id=c.mem_id) where free_num = #{freeNum}
